channel.title: Banner / client background request :)
channel.description: Name : ChizzleScape <---- this in blue on both want them like matching colours I want it say Remember To Vote Daily on the bottom of the client background on the banner I was wondering if I can get the ChizzleScape flashing with a white outline on the blue I like neon effects if that helps if you need any more information you could pm me , add me on skype, or leave a comment, offering moderator status
